data.title: Oakland County Intermediate School District
data.meta_description: Oakland Schools is a regional educational agency that provides quality support services, resources and programs throughout the 28 K-12 school districts that we service.
data.text:
The Oakland Schools Board of Education will hold a Regular Board Meeting on Tuesday, August 13 at 6:30 pm, at Oakland Schools, 2111 Pontiac Lake Road, Waterford, Michigan, in Conference Room A.

NOTE: Wearing a facial covering or mask is at the option of the individual attending. If an individual is ill or does not feel well they should NOT attend. Physical social distancing of six-feet is required, if feasible.

If you are an individual with a disability who is in need of a reader, amplifier, qualified sign language interpreter, or any other form of auxiliary aid or service to attend or participate in the meeting or hearing, please contact Nicole Christian, Executive Assistant, Office of the Superintendent & Board of Education at 248-209-2123 for voice calls and 248-209-2011 for TDD calls in advance of the meeting to request assistance.
